name: SANTAFANTAZMA
description:
Title: SANTA FANTAZMA .

Controls: Mouse only
Platform:windows

STORY: As the children of one such home prepare for bed on the eve of christmas,later that evening ... the magic of old saint nick arrive's only to see the table top game the children left unfinished. it's up to you and santa to complete the table top quest in session and conclude the tale of Santa Fantazma.
